meanings.definition: The act of transmitting a message or signal again.
meanings.sent1: The retransmissions of the distress signal ensured that help was on the way.
meanings.sent2: In the radio system, retransmissions are used to boost the signal strength.
meanings.sent3: The retransmissions of the love letter made it seem like a never-ending declaration.
meanings.sent4: Her retransmissions of gratitude were like echoes bouncing off the walls of his heart.
meanings.sent5: The constant retransmissions of the news bulletin kept the public informed.

meanings.definition: The process of sending data again in a communication system.
meanings.sent1: Automated retransmissions in the network ensure data integrity.
meanings.sent2: The retransmissions in the system helped in error correction.
meanings.sent3: The retransmissions of the email made it feel like it was stuck in a loop.
meanings.sent4: His retransmissions of the password request were like a broken record.
meanings.sent5: The repeated retransmissions of the file indicated a connectivity issue.
